name: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein / Bram Stoker's Dracula
overview: MARY SHELLEY'S FRANKENSTEIN: Three game play views - isometric, forced isometric and side views - offer enhanced 3D environment. Six huge levels of action, from the cholera-infested streets of Ingolstadt to the freezing ice fields of the Arctic. Fantastic assortment of bosses including outlaws, landlords and wolves.
